data.title: Become a member
data.meta_description: From as little as £3.50 a month for a Single membership, and £5.00 a month for a Joint membership, you support will mean that you are helping to protect over 1,000 years of history, art and architecture for the nation, ensuring that our 356 historic churches are open for everyone to enjoy and back at the heart of their communities once again.
data.text:
Supporting us as a member means that you will be helping to protect over 1,000 years of history, art and architecture for the nation.

Choose to support our churches based on where the need is greatest, or let us know on the joining form if you would like your membership fee to support a specific church in our care.

Step 1: Choose a membership
